**Position Summary...**  

  

**What you'll do...**

As a **Principal Data Scientist** , you will play a **critical role** in driving innovation and optimizing revenue through the application of advanced statistical and machine learning techniques. Our **Merchandise AI Team** within **Applied AI group** is the driving force behind our retail and e-commerce success, leveraging cutting-edge AI and machine learning techniques to optimize every aspect of our merchandising strategy. With a diverse blend of **expertise in statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and retail operations** , our team pioneers innovative solutions across the merchandising lifecycle, from demand forecasting and assortment planning to pricing optimization. We're dedicated to building algorithms that empower stakeholders throughout the organization to make informed, data-driven decisions, ensuring that we stay ahead of the curve in an ever-evolving retail landscape.  

  

**What you'll do :**
  

* **Strategic Leadership:** Provide strategic leadership and technical expertise in the development and implementation of pricing algorithms and models. Define the vision, roadmap, and priorities for **pricing optimization initiatives**.

* **Code Review:** Conduct thorough code reviews of pricing algorithms and related software components developed by the team. Ensure adherence to best practices, coding standards, and optimization techniques. Provide constructive feedback and mentorship to team members to enhance code quality and maintainability.

* **Model Evaluation and Optimization:** Oversee the evaluation, validation, and optimization of pricing models to ensure accuracy, reliability, and performance. Implement rigorous testing methodologies to assess model effectiveness and robustness.

* **Ph.D. or equivalent advanced degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics**, or related field.

* **Excellent communication and leadership skills** with the ability to influence and inspire cross-functional teams.
* Demonstrated ability to drive projects from conception to completion in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.

Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people. That's what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We're a team of software engineers, data scientists, cybersecurity expert's and service professionals within the world's leading retailer who make an epic impact and are at the forefront of the next retail disruption. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations. We are people-led and tech-empowered. We train our team in the skillsets of the future and bring in experts like you to help us grow. We have roles for those chasing their first opportunity as well as those looking for the opportunity that will define their career. Here, you can kickstart a great career in tech, gain new skills and experience for virtually every industry, or leverage your expertise to innovate at scale, impact millions and reimagine the future of retail.

As a Sr. HBM Component Validation Engineer for the DRAM Engineering Group, you will be part of a forward-thinking team of engineers that solves complex problems, responsible for enabling Micron’s products with flawless and issue-free release to both internal and external customers.


In HBM DEG (High Bandwidth Memory, DRAM Engineering Group), we innovate and integrate end-to-end groundbreaking front-end and backend processes with groundbreaking design, debugging various tests, and qualification techniques to develop the lowest power per bit solutions to improve customer experience in the field of ML (Machine Learning) and AI (Artificial Intelligence).The success of a sophisticated product such as HBM relies vastly on vertical integration and the various engineering working in unison.


To provide greater detail, our HBM technology pertains to stacking numbers of DRAM chips along with a logic chip within one package through an assembly technology called TSV (Through Silicon Via). This greatly increases the memory density in a package, while allowing very high-speed signal transmission. Furthermore, "high bandwidth"; is an outstanding memory design area where custom gate-level design and RTL style logic design are blended into the same product, and most of the DDR or LPDDR design is based on the gate-level design only. Lastly, verification and testing (validation) of HBM is the most ambitious due to the total size of the design and complexity of the functions, and in addition to craft, many innovations are needed for verification and validation of the HBM product, thereby making it uniquely exciting.
